title: The Other Americans - response to situation

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Lalami uses literary elements and techniques to convey the narrator’s complex response to her situation.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Lalami uses literary elements and techniques to convey the narrator’s complex response to her situation.

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe how textual details reveal nuances and complexities in characters' relationships with one another.
